postDetails.author: Nikhil
postDetails.content: Insights from Generation Z to get us thinking. Wellness,Student As the Uneo team – which itself is almost entirely made up of Generation Z’ers - started its journey to understand the use of technology and healthcare, we decided it was best to learn more from local high schoolers.
